venue.name: Silver Clay Fabulous Gifts and Studio

item.description: Basic Wire Wrapping. No experience necessary! $45 includes materials. Learn how to make a simple pair of earrings from pearls or stones. You will learn to make consistent, clean, professional basic wrapped loops.  With this skill you can make just about anything...bracelet, necklace, earrings! Whip up a few quick gifts, or just have some fun making quick and easy jewelry of your own design! Each student will leave with at least one finished piece. Stones and findings for additional earrings are available to purchase. Class taught by Marcia Boston of Maya Designs.
item.name: Basic jewelry making class - wire wrapping - no exp. needed!
